title: Episode 71: Horse Sense or Nonsense? Clever Hans is Alive and Well
description: Can horses be used for corporate training or is this nonsense? If you listened to the NPR piece called, "Horse Sense: New Breed Of Executive Training" you might have had the same reaction I did: sounds a little "fishy".  Find out why "Clever Hans" just might be alive and well in the field of management training.
